parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause the vehicle to become difficult to steer, leading to a loss of control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: power assist is reduced to manual mode
steering locks up during brake application
"cold power steering" (difficulty steering when the engine is cold).

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Vehicle misalignment can cause uneven tire wear, reduced fuel efficiency, and compromised handling, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle pulls to one side
abnormal noise from the steering system.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the inner and outer tie rods can cause loss of steering control, leading to accidents or wheel separation, which can result in serious injury or fatalities.
symptoms: Noise from the inner and outer tie rods
loose or worn-out tie rod ends

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the gas cylinder bracket can cause serious injury or even death, as it can fall on the driver or passenger, resulting in head trauma or other injuries.
symptoms: The gas cylinder bracket gives way
causing the rear door or liftgate to malfunction or fall.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Sub-Frame Separation due to Rusty Washers
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The separation of the sub-frame from the body can cause a loss of control of the vehicle, leading to accidents or near-miss incidents, which can result in serious injury or death.
